nodes.documentation:
Decentralized Paypal contract
for test purpose, these two stable coins token addresses are used:
0xc09E62C5c30644dce152B3fDcAFe7b8C86bc6719  USDT
0x96c54F2A5C3dE2fF5F1a1627EaEf2A1Ec88c9FD5  DAI
